title: Sneak Previews and New Year Promotions
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders hopes to release two new faces shortly- Bamberforth and Eldridge. A brief preview can be found at [http://gatf.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095608/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).

In the meantime, we have new year's special offers on our three most recent releases- Braxia, Tectura and Clunic - at [http://www.myfonts.com/foundry/gatf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095608/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/gatf/).
author: Rasendyll
